title: Newly Renovated 3 Bed. 1 Bath Heat incl. Private House
posting_body: ['Apartment includes:', 'Newly Renovated apt.', 'in Bedford Ave and Ave U', '2nd floor Apt.', 'Newly renovated in private house', '3 good size bedrooms', 'large living room', 'Separated modern kitchen with dinning room', 'Beautiful new tile and wood floor', '1 full tile bath', 'Heat and hotwater are included in rent', 'Close to All', 'Must be good credit and proof of income 40XRent.', 'Call or text.', 'agent 917-890-5945 for more details', 'We also have', '$2500 - Large Newly Renovated 4 Bedrooms 2 Bath over 1100sf ,', 'No utilities are included, 2nd floor apt.,', 'In Benson Ave and Bay 7th St. in Bensonhurst/Dyker Heights Area.', '$2800 - Large 3 Bedrooms 1 full bath over 1200sf  1st floor Private House, Backyard, parking is included, heat and hotwater are included in rent, E. 1st  Street and Ave U in Gravesend Area/Sheepshead Bay', 'All above apt. is excellent condition.', 'oakwood heights,oakwood,new dorp beach,lighthouse hill,midland beach,elbertville,new springville,bay terrace,great kills,south beachtodt hill,dongan hills,arrochar,', 'bensonhurst,bath beach,dyker heights,bayridge,bay ridge,gravesend,midwoomurray hill,flushing,aburndale,college point,whitestone,bay terrace,little neck,fresh meadows,oakland gardens,kew gardens,glen oaks,bellerose manord,kings highway,coney island,brighton beach,sunset park,park slope,borough park,park slope south,green wood heights,flat bush,bedstuy,crown heights,south williamsburg,clinton hill, kensington,']
